document_data.mainbody:
Jahaboam was a merchant of trinkets and far-flung wares from the City of Coin, Athkatla, in Amn in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Jahaboam was a large man with pale skin.
Jahaboams street stall could be found by Athkatlas docks in the Wave District in the . At that time, Jahaboams stock consisted of souvenirs and trinkets as well as some simple weapons and armor. The selection also included several more common potions and a certain enchanted keepsake locket, favored by Jaheira, a companion of Abdel Adrian.
